name: Find A Friend
description:
A simple puzzle game involving making many cute pet friends! Made for the Godot Wild Jam #24. Thank you for playing!
How to play:

There are 6 species of animals - dogs, cats, rabbits, chickens, pigs and mice. You start with two different colored animals of a given species. Each animals has its own set of statistics - cuteness, smartness, friendliness and elegance.

You can get new animals in two ways:

  • mating - select two animals of the same species to mate them resulting in a new animal of the same species, with a combination of parents' colors and statistics,
  • searching for a friend - you send your animal to search for a new one - its species is determined by the sent animal's statistics (different animals like different things), while its color and statistics might be random.

The goal is to get an animal with the indicated species and color combination.

Notes:

  • found animals always have a basic color (default red, green, blue or white)
  • you can only get complex colors by mating (default yellow, purple, dark aqua, black)
  • child's coloring can be any combination of parents' basic colors - for example purple parent (basic colors red and blue) + green parent (basic color green) can result in a child of any of those colors: red, green, blue, purple, yellow, dark aqua, black.
  • white is a special color, it will not provide any meaningful color variation to the child: for example white parent + yellow parent (basic colors red, green) can only result in white, red, green or yellow child.
Controls:
  • Move camera: W, A, S, D or click middle mouse button and move your mouse
  • Animal interaction: Left click to select for mating, right click to send on a search, middle click to pet.
